title: Dolle Mina
description: Lydie van der Ploeg has raised two children on her own while managing her doctors office.Now for the first time since she lost her husband she is getting close to another man, surgeon Hans Lansberg.

title: De minnaar en zijn pieper
description: After spending the night at Lydie's place, Hans has left his beeper lying somewhere about the house. Koos stays home with an aching back but Mien gets him to fix Dr. Lydie's plumbing anyway.

title: Een helpende hand
description: With her husband Koos at home sporting a bad back and the Van Der Ploeg family relying on her for all their household needs, Mien Dobbelsteen becomes overworked and needs to relax on the couch.

title: Kamernood
description: Koos wants to turn the attic into a room to rent out. Nancy joins some friends who are squatting. But when one of them goes into labor, Nancy gets her mother to help deliver it.

title: Slachtpaard
description: When Nancy goes protesting against the slaughter of horses, her mother ends up with an Irish horse in the backyard. A pretty girl wants to rent the Dobbelsteen's attic.

title: Waar is Hans Lansberg?
description: Lydie gets a telephone call for Hans in the middle of the night. Since nobody knows where he is, Nancy immediately suspects he's seeing another woman. Koos tries to show Mien the joy of fishing.

title: De Auto
description: Koos has bought a second hand car, which soon comes in handy when Lydie can't find her keys and has to pick up grandmother from the station.

title: Lenen
description: Gert-Jan wants to borrow 1000 guilders to buy a car and go on holiday with his girlfriend Claartje. Hans lends him the money so that he can have more time alone with Lydie on holiday in his sisters house in France. Meanwhile Mien is not happy at all with Koos's falling apart car.

title: Pizza
description: Lydie is feeling ill and both Gert-Jan and Hans think it may be a bit more serious than a common cold. Koos attempts to bake an 'original' Italian pizza but ends up calling in a favour from a shady friend to serve a meal to Mien and the Van der Ploeg household.

title: De zus van Hans
description: Koos has spotted Hans with another woman and is certain he's cheating on Lydie. When Hans hurts himself playing tennis, Mien and Koos grab the opportunity to snoop around in Hans's flat. There they find the fur coat his lady friend was wearing the other night.

title: De flat
description: Hans offers Gert Jan is flat for a week while he is nursing his broken arm at Lydie's. Gert Jan quickly turns the flat into a rental which causes confusion when Mien comes round to clean up.

title: Ankie
description: Nancy takes home a 14 year old punk girl called Ankie and wants to straighten her out physiologically. But Ankie's (ex) boyfriend soon causes trouble for the entire household.

title: Leerplicht
description: Ankie has been staying in Nancy's room for a week and Mien is thoroughly annoyed by her. Lydie also agrees she cannot claim that Ankie is too sick to go to school forever. Then two policemen call at the front door...

title: De eerste prijs
description: Gert Jan wins a 1000 guilders with a photograph he took of Ankie and is offered a job as a wedding photographer. He wants to buy a car to go with this job and comes home with a hearse.

title: Eindexamen
description: The Dobbelsteen's are nervous because of a visit to the tax-man. Nancy is even more nervous because of her English exam. Gert Jan gets to know Nancy's friend Nel a lot better.

title: Een middagje vissen
description: Nancy is leaving for Kenia to work in the Development Aid. But first she has to be distracted so she doesn't notice her family is planning a surprise party. Koos and Mien may have to miss the party when their fishing trip goes awry.

title: Jarige mien
description: Because of a mix up, Mien gets several of the same wristwatches for her birthday. Hans asks Lydie to marry her.

title: De verbouwing
description: In preparation for Hans moving into Lydie's house, Nancy's room is being turned into a workplace for him. Ankie has a mysterious illness, which Gert Jan suspects might be malaria.

title: Pien
description: Koos & Mien have offered up their Saturday to help put up wallpaper for Dr. Lydie and Hans. Gert Jan has brought home psychology student Pien, who, unlike his usual girlfriends, made him sleep on the couch.

title: Bedside Manners
description: To get themselves some experience during their study in medicine, Gert-Jan and Pien start their own patients advice bureau.

title: Twee keer Hans
description: Mien visits her niece Joke in hospital where the young woman has promptly fallen in love with a handsome doctor. Mien suspects it might be Hans Lansberg...

title: De rode knop
description: When Dr. Lydie's mother ends up in the hospital after an incident with a burglar, Koos installs a burglar alarm in the doctors home.

title: Liefde op het eerste gezicht
description: Mien and Koos are practicing a little song and dance act for the wedding of their niece Joke. Pien is writing an essay about sex and violence and Mien misplaces Pien's study material: a collection of dirty magazines.

title: De Achterhoek
description: Mien has said yes to Lydie doing an interview. Lydie insists that Mien join her for the photograph. Lydie and Hans go away for a weekend so they can get away from their busy schedules and plan their wedding day.

title: Koos ontslagen
description: Koos is down and ashamed because he lost his job. Mien decides that she will start paying taxes on her work instead of him. Pien disappears after an argument with Gert Jan about her looks.

title: De Sportschool
description: Lydie is looking for a larger house. Mien suggests buying the one next door and breaking away some of the connecting walls. Gert Jan becomes exited about renting out the ground floor of the second house and starting a fitness center.

title: Nachtmerries
description: Gert Jan & Pien check a fitness and body building center to see how much it would cost to set one up of their own. This leaves Gert Jan aching all over during the night. Both Lydie and Hans have forgotten the date on which they are to sign for their impending wedding.

title: De Maat
description: Mien objects to Koos hiring a co-worker now that he's working for himself. Hans talks Gert Jan in to joining him ice-skating.

title: Paella
description: Dr. Lydie is having a terrible day. Koos is refurbishing her waiting room and all the patients are relocated to the dining room. When she's out visiting patients, she gets a flat tire and to top it all, Hans has invited a Spanish colleague over for diner.

title: Vreemdgaan
description: Koos needs a tuxedo for a dance night. Dr. Lydie proposes to lend him Dr. Lansberg's tux. Meanwhile Lydie is getting all dressed up for several mysterious rendezvous with another man.

title: De Trouwjurk
description: Lydie is disappointed that Nancy can't come to the wedding, but Hans has something up his sleeve. Mien insists that Lydie buys something new to wear during the ceremony and that they go out shopping together.

title: Twee vliegen in één klap
description: It's Lydie and Hans's wedding day. Although they only want a small ceremony followed by a honeymoon in Kenya (to visit Lydie's daughter Nancy) they still end up with two cakes and a big surprise from Gert Jan and Pien.

title: Compilatie
description: A compilation of the funniest and most important situations from the previous season broadcast a week before the start of season 5.

title: Paars is niet lelijk
description: Gert-Jan and Pien are doing a pregnancy test. Mien has bought an expensive purple wig to wear during a dance night. Then Koos has an accident involving a bucket of varnish on his head.

title: 'n Kruidnageltje doet wonderen
description: Pien's pregnancy test proves positive. When Mien has a terrible toothache, Gert-Jan prescribes old fashioned herbal medicine.

title: De allessnijder
description: Dr. Lydie offers unemployed children's doctor Thea a job in her practice. Koos buys an old van from Jopie. A man arrives to demonstrate a new revolutionary knife, but Lydie has forgotten to arrange an audience for him.

title: Kinderpret
description: Mien is decorating the waiting room for Thea's new children's appointments. But Lydie seems to be busier then ever caring for little children while Thea only gets two patients on her first day.

title: Bruin brood
description: Mien is on a diet that consists of only eating brown bread. Hans has stopped smoking with a little help from acupuncture. Lydie's even more absent minded mother is suffering from fleas.

title: 'n scheve schaats
description: Hans is practicing for an ice skating marathon with Thea. Both Koos and Gert-Jan express concerns that Hans may be cheating on Lydie. Mien and Koos are going to a costumed ball.

title: Çanci
description: Mien goes shopping with her Turkish friend Hülya. Hans's sister Çanci is coming to stay and Lydie, Gert Jan & Koos all offer to provide her a place to stay. But Pien becomes jealous and Mien also objects.

title: Sleutels
description: Hans is going away for a week and Gert Jan & Pien are sleeping in Leiden. Lydie has a hangover from the going away dinner and has lost her keys. Koos and Mien are nervous about burglaries and insist on a new lock and keys.

title: Karel
description: Lydie gets a visit from her old flame Karel the dentist. Koos has bought an expensive new TV set from Jopie. Mien invites the doctor and family to come over and watch Dr. Lansberg skating in Finland.

title: Tot de rand gevuld
description: Koos gets a fishhook stuck in his foot and with Lydie and Hans away, Gert-Jan decides to attend the patient.

title: Aerobics
description: Pregnant Pien is feeling bored and wants to teach Aerobics classes, but overprotective Gert Jan forbids it. When Gert Jan tells Pien to ask his mother for advice, Lydie wisely insists she goes for a second opinion.

title: Potje Tennis
description: Lydie is afraid of getting older, so Hans suggests she takes up tennis. Mien thinks a long weekend at a beauty farm might do wonders.

title: De vader van Lydie
description: A man claiming to be Lydie's father appears on her doorstep, even though she thinks the man's been dead for 40 years. Koos and Mien try out their new camper which doesn't prove itself waterproof.

title: Tutti frutti
description: Mien has started selling second hand clothes with a Turkish girlfriend, Hulya. Lydie gives them permission to clean out her attic. Koos is more reluctant when Mien and Hulya want to go out to a disco.

title: What's in a ...
description: While discussing a name for Gert Jan & Pien's unborn child, Lydie suggests they name it after her. Meanwhile Koos & Mien are suffering from a new neighbour who is loudly renovating his house day and night.

title: Jopie
description: Mien objects to Koos lending Jopie 25000 guilders. When Koos explains that women cannot understand the friendship between two men, Dr. Lydie suggests that Mien should make her husband jealous.

title: Moppie
description: Mien's cunning plan to get rid of Jopie continues as he comes round to ask her out for a date. Thea and Map are thinking of going to the sperm bank for a baby.

title: Koos gaat uit z'n broek
description: Koos is suffering from a stomach ache but is ashamed to pull down his trousers in front of Dr. Lydie. When Lydie and Hans diagnose a acute appendicitis, he is taken to the hospital, where Mien gets lost.

title: Toneelspelen
description: Because Koos is being pampered during his hospital stay, he doesn't want to go home yet. When Dr. Lansberg spills the beans to Mien, she decides to make Koos jealous to get him home in now time.

title: Aaaah!
description: Lydie and Hans are going on a weekend trip to Texel. Mien is sowing costumes for Gert-Jan and Pien who are going to a costumed ball dressed as Snow White and Doc. At the party, Pien goes into labor.

title: Houd de dief!
description: Mien and Koos are going on Holiday to France with their camper. Their friends Sjaan and Peter will house sit. Pien and Gert-Jan object to Lydie mothering their baby Pim.

title: Geen Camping
description: Pientje is offered a job taking over a practice for one year but she is reluctant to leave 6 month old Pimmetje alone. The Dobbelsteen's camper holiday is hindered by French policemen and overfull camping's.

title: Lekke Band
description: Gert Jan & Pien are glad to have the entire house to themselves when Lydie leaves for Athens to join Hans. Koos finds it difficult to express himself in French while on holiday.

title: Brandstofpech
description: When Koos & Mien's camper breaks down on holiday, Jopie comes to the rescue and takes along his new girlfriend.

title: 'n moeilijke patient
description: Hans is requested to come back early from his holiday in Greece to operate on his mentor. Mien is picked out to enter the radio quiz 'Toontje Hoger'.

title: Paspoort
description: Jopie urges Koos to join his bicycle club. Hans hurries back to Athens because he took Lydie's replacement passport back with him in his wallet.

title: Thuiskomst
description: When she finds her patient Mvr. Doks is being abused by her husband, Lydie advises the woman to hit him back. Hans is finally returning from Athens after making a completely unnecessary return trip.

title: Rijbewijs
description: Lydie's driving license has expired, meaning she has to take a new exam and can't drive a car until she passes. This poses a problem for all her emergency patient visits, so Mien suggests that Koos becomes her driver.

title: Angst
description: Hans and Gert Jan manage to make Lydie even more nervous than necessary for her first driving lesson. Mien has also been taking driving lessons (for the first time) but wants to keep them a secret from Koos.

title: Vreten op aarde
description: Lydie and Hans decide to invite everybody round for Christmas diner. Mien orders Koos to rent a tuxedo. Hans invites an old college friend of his, Bart.

title: Mevrouw Hamer
description: Koos & Mien have oversleep meaning Mien is busier than ever while Koos takes it easy as Dr. Lydie's chauffeur. Lydie's patient Mrs. Hamer appears to be suffering from an early form of dementia.

title: Koos Kampioen
description: Dr. Lydie is celebrating her 45th birthday and Mien wants to attend, but on the same day Koos has to compete in the home training bicycle final. Lydie's mother gives her an heirloom that originally belonged to her own grandmother.

title: De oom van Hulja
description: Koos is enjoying his temporary job as Dr. Lydie's personal driver. When the uncle of Mien's Turkish friend Hulya tells them someone sold him a car with no working brakes, Koos & Mien decide to get to the bottom of this.

title: Geslaagd!
description: Lydie is about to have her driving exam and is understandably nervous. Hans tries to ease her mind by opening an expensive bottle of wine and boasts about being a sommelier.

title: De tussendeur
description: Pien feels like raising Pimmetje is slipping away from her and wants to live a more separate with Gert Jan. Hans comes to the same conclusion on his own.

title: Babykleertjes
description: Thea had promised Map to go shopping for their unborn baby, but when something comes up, Gert Jan has to take her place. Soon the two of them are pretending to be husband and wife and Mien is getting suspicious.

title: Ouderdom komt met gebreken
description: Mien needs a pair of glasses but only wants to wear them while adjusting to contact lenses. Of course she loses her lenses on the first day she has them when Koos (who doesn't know about them) drinks the water that's holding them.

title: Rijles
description: Rather than having to examine Mien's driving knowledge verbally, Koos proposes to join her during a lesson in the backseat. Lydie is missing the amount of time she used to be able to spend with Pimmetje.

title: Foutje!
description: Jopie talks Koos into selling fake 'Tior' sweaters on the market. But first they need to sow the phony labels into each one of the garments. Lydie is helping out teaching first aid and Mien decides to play a joke on Koos.

title: Nieuw Spullen
description: Lydie and Marjan are looking to find new furniture at an auction. Meanwhile Jopie has lost all of his furniture after being burgled.

title: Dat moet toch...
description: Hans buys a second hand sailboat. Lydie and Mien feel sorry for Gert-Jan because Pien has left him but Hans and Koos think there is little to be sorry about.

title: Poes
description: Lydie and Mien are concerned because Gert Jan has been seeing a lot of different women since he's been on the rebound. Hans insists on buying a motor to go with their new sailboat.

title: 'n Handje helpen
description: Koos has bought a (leaking) aquarium from Jopie. Lydie and Hans spend their first night on their sailboat but keep being interrupted by visitors.

title: Vissie kijken
description: Pim is coming to stay during the weekend. Mien wants him to see the new aquarium. Hans & Lydie have both bought him a tiny life vest to wear on their boat. And Gert Jan asks Koos to pick up Pim at the train station.

title: Bij de tijd
description: Mien's father is coming to visit and have a thorough check-up at Dr. Lydie's insistence. But when he's put on a train by his other daughter Annie one day earlier than planned, he fails to arrive in Amsterdam.

title: Opgegeven
description: Arie Kalkman, Mien's dad, spends a day in the hospital being examined by Dr. Lansberg. But he objects to being given special treatment and suspects the doctors aren't telling him the entire truth.

title: Spit
description: Koos is feeling better then ever because of his cycling hobby. That is, until he gets lower backer pain. Arie Kalkman makes sure Koos swallows all his medicine, with unexpected results...

title: De Belasting
description: After witnessing firemen in action at Jopie's auto repair, Koos considers joining the reserve fire fighters. Teuntje is upset because Gert Jan is spending too much time on the phone (arguing) with Pien. Hans & Lydie's blind friend Frits visits unexpectedly.

title: Zwartkijken
description: Arie Kalkman thinks the doctors are keeping something from him, so Hans invites him back tot he hospital for another talk. Lydie needs a dress for the Red Cross gala.

title: Hoofdluis
description: Hans persuades Lydie to ask Gert Jan to join her doctor's practice. Mien and Koos are suffering from head lice.

title: Super
description: Gert Jan bumps into Map at a café. Jopie, with insurance money in hand, wants to start a new business together with Koos. Lydie has a little clothing mishap at the gas station on her way to a chic party.

title: Video
description: Jopie & Koos are brainstorming about what kind of business they will go into. Lydie and Miep suggest that Gert Jan may join in with them. But when they see Map being photographed as a model they hit on it: video recording.

title: De das om
description: Hans bumps into Gert Jan's former flame Esther van Dam while ice skating and she forgets her scarf. Gert Jan refuses to bring it back and when Lydie finds Esther's phone number, she gets jealous nightmares.

title: De sjaal
description: Esther drops by the hospital to pick up her scarf from Hans, flirts with him and fails to take the item of clothing with her once more. Meanwhile, Map makes Gert Jan question his love for Teuntje for a moment.

title: Henny Huisman
description: Lydie finally goes round to Esther's to return the shawl and is hit upon by Esther's boyfriend Casper. Meanwhile at home a Dutch celebrity with a sore throat awaits her. Mien insists Koos gets a new suit for KoJo Video.

title: Echokabouter
description: Koos & Jopie go to a fancy lawyer to set up their new business. Teuntje's friend Claire needs a place to stay after leaving her boyfriend Ron, who promptly shows up on Lydie's doorstep.

title: Schijnheilig
description: Mien has chickenpox, so her sister Annie is asked to fill in and do Dr. Lydie's household for a few weeks. Gert Jan declines Koos & Jopie's offer to join them in their video business.

title: Witte muizen
description: Lydie is unhappy that Gert Jan accepted a job in a medical lab and once more offers him to take over part of her practice. Jopie and Annie are attracted to each other.

title: Wie is de baas
description: Pa Kalkman visits unexpectedly, falls asleep on the doctor's couch and accidentally lights it on fire with his cigar. Mien tells Annie not to let Jopie boss her around.

title: De receptie
description: There is a reception to celebrate the working relationship between mother and son Van der Ploeg. Gert Jan worries because Pien has been invited and Hans joins him when Esther's name turns up on the guest list as well.

title: Gast aan tafel
description: Lydie and Mien want to give money to a good cause that feeds people in the third world. Hans invites a colleague from Gambia over for dinner and receives a good luck charm in return.

title: De tijdbom
description: Mien tries to keep her driving exam a secret from Koos. Forgetful patient Mrs. Hamer tells Gert Jan she isn't allowed to keep a dog at her home and promptly leaves the animal in the waiting room.

title: Opgeruimd staat netjes
description: Gert-Jan tries to convince his mother to buy a computer for their practice. Koos wants to get out of Kojo Video because he can't stand bossy Annie any longer.

title: Goudeerlijk
description: When Koos tells Jopie he wants to get out of Kojo Video, Jopie promises to calculate exactly how much Koos's share is worth. Lydie's new dog Flossie is unfairly accused of stealing Mien's freshly bought meat from her bag.

title: Op de groei
description: When Jopie buys a diamond ring for Annie, Koos feels obliged to purchase one for Mien as well - but he won't give it to her until the holidays. Hans' message about having a Chinese diner for 9 gets misinterpreted as usual.

title: Heerlijk avondje
description: Mien was acting very jealous concerning Annie's diamond ring until she finds the present Koos has been hiding for the Sinterklaas celebration.

title: Niet voor de poes
description: Teuntje throws a party for the grand opening of her photo studio but lets her cat get out in the process. Koos tries to quit smoking by chewing nicotine gum but still can't resist lighting up simultaneously.

title: Op hoop van zegen
description: Lydie & Hans want to sell their boat but Koos & Jopie convince them to rent it out instead. When the men go out sailing to film a video advertisement they end up in heavy weather, leading their wives to worry at home.

title: Bemoeien
description: Now that Gert-Jan is sharing her practice, Lydie has too much time on her hands and starts to interfere with Mien's housework and even Hans' surgery.

title: Opwindend
description: Gert-Jan and Teuntje are constantly arguing and thereby neglecting his son Pim. Mien invites everyone round on Saturday so Koos can showing the home movie featuring Hans' sailboat, now retitled 'Op Hoop Van Zegen'.

title: Floppy
description: Gert-Jan and Hans won't let Lydie touch the new computer, not knowing she has secretly been taking lessons. Once again, Koos is asked to fix up Lydie's practice.

title: De logé
description: Hans is expecting his niece Wiep to come and stay but she doesn't show up on the designated time.

title: Veilig vrijen
description: Lydie and Hans are surprised to learn Wiep's boyfriend Huub has spent the night in her room. The next night, while everyone is busy painting the doctors office, Huub tries to sneak into the house again.

title: Privacy
description: Lydie has to write a lecture for a group of farm women but can't find a single moment of privacy in her busy household.

title: Aan-uit-aan-uit
description: Everybody is thoroughly confused whether Wiep and Huub's relationship is over or not. Meanwhile Mean is confused about a smelly piece of cheese in Teuntje's cupboard.

title: Cultuur shock
description: Teuntje invites everyone to a Japanese dinner. Wiep is going back to France and waiting for her mother Çanci to come pick her up.

title: Kettingreactie
description: Koos has bought a chain letter from Mrs. Bijlstra and soon finds out it's not so easy to get rid of them. Gert-Jan has a new car phone for his new car.

title: Even lezen
description: Mien and Koos worry that her father is getting senile. However, the old man still seems a smart businessman as far as Hans is concerned. Gert-Jan receives a request from his sister Nancy to send some out of work doctors to Kenia.

title: Piep
description: Hans present Lydie with a whistle activated beeper on her key-chain. But she still manages to lose it almost immediately, in a public mail box no less.

title: Eventjes dan
description: Mien and Koos are looking to buy a new camper but in order to afford it, they finally need to get their 3000 guilder loan from Jopie back. Gert-Jan & Teuntje decide to go to Kenia, but Lydie is too busy to listen to them.

title: Recht voor z'n raap
description: Gert-Jan is meeting with Pien about leaving for Kenya and finds a replacement doctor for Lydie's practice, but still hasn't had a chance to tell his mother about his and Teuntje's migration.

title: Interviews Met De Cast En Crew
Wie kent wie kwis
description: Koos is not very enthusiastic when Mien tells him they may get the chance to take part in a television quiz. Dr. John has taken over Gert-Jan's work in Lydie's practice. Hans' niece Wiep is coming back to stay in Amsterdam.

title: Spoedgeval
description: Lydie is in hospital, recovering from a car accident. When Koos' bicycle is stolen for the third time in a row, Jopie comes up with an innovative way to replace it.

title: Leugentje om bestwil
description: On the day Lydie is returning home from hospital, Koos and Mien are supposed to go the selection for the Weekend Quiz in Hilversum.

title: Kleine criminaliteit
description: Koos and Mien have come through the first selection for the quiz. Jopie has built Koos a bicycle that looks like it belongs on the scrapyard, so it will never be stolen.

title: Kaartjes
description: Wiep and John spend a night in line to get tickets to a

title: Kwissen
description: The day of the TV quiz has finally come. Jopie and Annie are Mien and Koos' loudest supporters. Lydie and Hans have a couple of psychiatrists over for dinner and stand to miss the Dobbelsteens on Television.

title: Een schitterend tuinmeublement
description: Mien and Koos have got a house full of beautiful prizes, but no garden to put their new outdoor furniture. Wiep and Dr. John have spend their first night together and he immediately proposes the next morning.

title: Pas op de verf
description: Koos has neglected to give their front door a new lick of paint. Mien decides to let Wiep and her artistic classmates have a go when Koos is out fishing with Jopie.

title: Bij de wilde konijnen af
description: Flossie the dog has been hunting rabbits in Buurman Buys' garden. Koos is called on to make sure the fence is impenetrable, but Flossie still finds a way round.

title: Matten
description: Lydie and Hans are all dressed up to go to a ball in Leiden. Wiep has asked Dr. John out to dinner and Mien drags Koos out to go dancing. Afterwards, when Lydie is walking the dog, she stumbles upon a brawl in a bar.

title: Wijn
description: Mien attends to a bleeding patient when both doctors are out. When she receives a box of expensive wine bottles in return, Hans wants to keep them for himself. Meanwhile Mien would rather have a new pair of boots.

title: Kunst
description: Lydie is talked into hanging a hideous painting from an art student in her waiting room, sees her car radio being stolen while looking at the window and gets a ticket when parked in front of the police station.

title: Vertrek Wiep
description: Wiep is going on a school trip to Florence for a fortnight. Everybody else is stumped by a riddle. Lydie gets a new car radio and promptly leaves it in a phone box.

title: Lekker Bellen
description: Çanci comes to visit unexpectedly and brings along her Italian boyfriend who immediately takes possession of Lydie's telephone line.

title: De expert
description: Neither Hans nor Koos has much good to say about Çanci's boyfriend Paolo. Koos even suspects he may be a mafiosi. Then two policemen including one from Interpol appear on the Doctor's doorstep.

title: De Parelvissers
description: Koos is surprised to find Mien ironing Mr. Paolo's silk shirts. Hans finally bonds with Paolo over a bottle and a little amateur opera singing.

title: Adio...
description: Hans and Paolo make an enormous spectacle out of cooking dinner for the ladies. But during dinner Paolo and Çanci get into an argument. Annie is also upset with Jopie and wants to spend the night at Koos & Mien's

title: Verrassing
description: Wiep arrives home from Italy bearing gifts. Now that Annie and Jopie have broken up, Mien asks her sister to join her and Koos during their upcoming holiday to Athens.

title: Athene
description: Koos, Mien, Jopie & Annie are on holiday in Athens and Wiep is doing the housekeeping for Dr. Lydie. Hans proposes that he and Lydie also go to Athens for a doctors congress and Koos gets lost in the Greek hotel.

title: Athene II
description: The night before Lydie & Hans leave for Athens, Buurman Buys keeps calling at the front door because he's locked himself out. Once the doctors pair is in Greece, they keep missing the Doppelsteen party by a hair.

title: La Cloche
description: Koos is having a difficult time finding work and finances in the Dobbelsteen household are getting a bit tight. Wiep gets a part-time job modeling swimwear and insists on taking Dr. John out to expensive restaurant 'La Cloche'.

title: De doos van Pandora
description: Mien tricks Koos into help cleaning Lydie's mother's house on the eve of her return from Canada. When grandma does arrive, she does so carrying the wrong suitcase, which is filled to the brim with sexy underwear.

title: Ingewikkeld
description: Upset because one of her neighbours died and nobody noticed, Mien insists that Lydie's mother gets an alarm installation installed (by Koos). Jopie has a new job for Koos: fixing up rowboats.

title: Nee
description: Wiep objects when John wants to buy a red MG. Hans thinks Lydie has to say no to taking on too many new activities. Mien is posing for Wiep. An old flame of Hans becomes his colleague at the hospital.

title: Kersenbonbons
description: Mien gets to know Neighbor Buys a little better because of some wrongly delivered letters. She also misunderstands Dr. John's relationship to a patient and invites Koos over for lunch at the Doctor's for a big surprise.

title: Top Secret
description: Lydie and John have both noticed that drugs are missing from the medicine cabinet. The police advises to install an alarm and to keep this a secret from as many people as possible. Mien is burning with curiosity when Koos is asked to install the device and she's not allowed to know what it is.

title: Lokaas
description: Wiep is upset when suspicions about the medicine theft turns towards her. Mien is helping neighbor Buys with his washing and solving cryptograms.

title: Oma's sleutel
description: Koos has framed Miep's portrait (painted by Wiep) and even Neighbor Buys is invited to come take a look at it. Lydie becomes concerned when her mother doesn't answer the phone.

title: In de soep
description: Jopie & Annie surprise Koos & Mien with a weekend away. As Mien had just made a large pot of soup for the entire weekend, she gives it to Lydie and Hans. But they are also going away so the pot keeps changing hands...

title: Verstand van kunst
description: Hans purposely breaks an ugly vase that Mien and Koos brought back from Athens. But when Lydie pretends to be heartbroken in front of Mien, Koos has to glue the pieces back together again.

title: Te water
description: Koos sells a boat to an old acquaintance of Lydie, Jan-Willem. But when the boat is put to water Koos is delayed and Mien gets in trouble.

title: De etspers
description: Wieps birthday is approaching fast and both Lydie & Hans and Dr. John buy her an etching press without the other party's knowledge. However, the transport service is only able to deliver one at a time.

title: Sexy
description: Koos sits down to write his first ever cover letter when he learns there's a job opening in a warehouse. Hans & Lydie go shopping armed with long lists from several different people.

title: Feestje
description: Lydie and Hans are too tired to go to a party in a castle and come up with a couple of excuses. Koos doesn't want to accept a proposal for a cover letter written by Buurman Buys.

title: M.V. Greenpeace
description: Buys talks Koos into doing community service on a Greenpeace ship. Koos as carpenter and Buys as Russian translator. Lydie has moved a diner date, meaning Hans has to give up his golf lesson.

title: Op actie
description: Mien is afraid for Koos's life when he volunteers to go into action for Greenpeace. Wiep and John argue about her taking in a house-guest.

title: De slapjanus
description: Koos is stuck on the couch with his leg in a cast. Wiep and Lydie attend and auction. Everybody is still looking to find a place to stay for Felix.

title: Lamsbout
description: Mien is preparing a large lamb-chop for dinner but can't find anyone who'll lend her a saw to cut it's leg off.

title: Het cadeau
description: When Hans receives a painting from a grateful patient, Wiep is immediately convinced it is an actual Jongkind.

title: Uitstel
description: Hans removes the cast from Koos' leg and causes an accident on the golf course. Mien asks Buys to write a speech for Jopie & Annie's upcoming wedding.

title: Kraaienloop
description: Hans goes jogging with Wiep & John and disappears. He claims to have helped a woman in distress but no one believes him. Jopie doesn't want to spend too much money on his wedding.

title: Insluipers
description: A burglar escapes from a neighboring house in to the Dobbelstein's attic. Wiep and John run out on each other after a flaming argument.

title: Gevoel voor humor
description: Lydie is stuck in Oldenzaal during a rain storm. Hans is unable to go fetch her because his car breaks down. Mien volunteers to go get her with Koos.

title: De Chinees
description: When John tries to pick up a video tape at his old address, he finds a Chinese lady living there who doesn't speak a word of Dutch. Mien thinks of a way to retrieve the tape for the young doctor.

title: Rode vlekken
description: Jopie & Annie argue over a new couch while having diner at Koos & Mien's. Hans is ill and wants to be examined at the hospital but all the other doctors in the house tell him to simply stay in bed for a day.

title: Dinky Toy
description: Mien is helping Lydie clean out her attic where they find some classic Kapitein Rob comics and original Dinkey Toy cars. Koos bumps into Martin from Greenpeace and gets a job fixing up their new flagship.

title: Zorgen
description: Wiep & John have an argument because she wants to go to Berlin and he to Paris. John asks Mien's advice and she proposes that he surprises Wiep in Paris. Meanwhile Wiep confides in Hans who tells her to surprise John in Berlin.

title: Heerlijk avondje 2
description: Koos insists on trying to fix an old record player, so Mien decides to buy a CD-player for St. Nicholas. But when she stores it in Lydie's closet, Hans finds it and assumes it's for him.

title: De blouse
description: Lydie is planning a surprise diner with Hans to celebrate their first date 12.5 years earlier. She wants to wear the exact same dress but when Koos gets it dirty, Mien goes out of her way to make a replica.

title: Kerstmis
description: Mien wants to invite neighbor Buys for Christmas dinner. Oma has lost an envelop full of money and Hans decides to help her out by place another one carrying the same amount somewhere where she will easily find it.

title: Amandla
description: Wiep has finished two paintings in an exhibition about the AMC and decides that John should be Master of Ceremonies at the opening. He asks Buurman Buys to write a speech for him.

title: Lekker d'r uit
description: Mien & Koos are invited to stay in Turkey for a holiday by Efza and her father. Wiep has a terrible toothache but refuses to see a dentist. Hans is supposed to take Grandma to a concert but both prefer visiting the golf course.

title: De Ming-vaas
description: Mien insists on taking care of Buys's house when he's away in France, and promptly breaks a valuable vase. Lydie wants to buy a piano so she can start to play again.

title: De portefeuille
description: Koos finds a wallet filled with 12.00 guilders and a photograph but no address. Jopie has all kinds of ideas about handling the situation but Mien insists on informing the police and keeping the wallet safe at home.

title: Verlanglijstje
description: Mien and Koos are pondering what to give Jopie & Annie for their wedding. Lydie has misplaced an article she promised to read before the writer comes over for diner. Dr. John has had an offer for work in Suriname.

title: 'n Veeg uit de pan
description: When Wiep finds several of her drawings smudged, she blames Mien Dobbelsteen's cleaning. Buurman Buys has been offered a job in the Dutch embassy in Moscow.

title: J.A.M. Schellenduyn
description: Mien is very offended when Buurman Buys claims he doesn't know her when they meet on the street. Everybody is invited to the wedding of a certain Johannes Antonius Maria Schellenduyn but nobody is exactly sure who that is.

title: Leugentje om bestwil 2
description: Mien tries to one-up her sister Annie exercising and ends up hurting all over the next day. Hans brings an old friend from Scotland home for dinner.

title: Foster Parents
description: When pictures of two Foster Parents children arrive, Koos & Mien can't decide which one to keep for themselves and which one to give away to Jopie & Annie. Hans tries to use Lydie's PIN-code but ends up with a blocked pass.

title: De bruiloft
description: Jopie & Annie's wedding day has arrived and Mien is extremely nervous because of her upcoming performance with Koos. Hans tries to get out of attending the reception but Lydie won't allow it.

title: Vakantie
description: John & Wiep cancel their trip to Paramaribo and decide to have a holiday in Bergen instead. Koos wants to buy a video camera. Lydie loses her wallet and all her credit cards.

title: De thuiskomst
description: Lydie is exhausted from managing her practice on her own while John & Wiep were away. When Jopie has a checkup at Lydie's, Mien becomes extremely concerned about him.

title: De snoek
description: John buys an old, beat up Citroën for Wiep with plans to fix it up with Marius. But Mien & Koos convince Lydie to swap it for a working model bought from Jopie.

title: Fluitje van een cent
description: Annie wants Jopie to have a vasectomy so wants to ask Dr. John's advice, but finds Dr. Lydie instead. Wiep is asked to illustrated a children's book called Kabouter Krotemik

title: De kamerjas
description: When Hans receives a bathrobe from a female patient everybody suspects she wants more from him except Hans himself. Annie wants Mien to join her in a trip to a beauty farm.

title: Heel zeker
description: Mien is burgled while shopping for Dr. Lydie. Thanks to her accurate description, the young culprit is caught and identified by her. But then she begins to doubt if she didn't make a mistake.

title: De vermiste lente
description: An angry man threatens Lydie because she told his wife not to take any more abuse from him. Wiep & John visit a restaurant where she once sold a painting and find an original Karel Appel.

title: Golfwidow
description: When several beautiful women are spotted entering the house formally occupied by Buurman Buys, Mien decides to borrow a cup of sugar. It turns out the new neighbor is a pilot who rents out rooms to stewardesses.

title: Opname
description: Despite Lydie's protests, Hans buys a video recorder so he won't miss a golf match on TV. Koos poses for a painting by Wiep, who has something to prove to her art teacher.

title: Massage
description: Annie has a secret meeting with a strong and handsome German masseur she met in the health spa but Jopie is on to her. Dr. John wants to expand his work load but Lydie takes offense to having to retire early.

title: De erfenis
description: Koos receives a letter from an attorney regarding an inheritance from an unknown English relative. John becomes suspicious when neighbor Rik invites Wiep over to his house because he would like to purchase one of her paintings.

title: Herman
description: Hans & John disapprove when Lydie and Wiep pay special attention to neighbor Rik and his sore throat. Koos' inheritance involves taking care of a 30 year old turtle, whom Mien names 'Herman' and subsequently loses in Lydie's garden.

title: De achtervolging
description: Mien is convinced she's being followed by two men but nobody else ever sees them.

title: Het portret
description: Koos' portrait by Wiep turns out a bit more somber than expected. Of course neither Mien nor Koos has the courage to tell Wiep they don't really like it. Neighbor Rik can't stop flirting with Lydie no matter what.

title: Tante Engel
description: John's favourite Aunt Engel comes to stay in Wiep's room for a while. She immediately starts taking over all of Mien's work.

title: Buys is back
description: Çanci's unannounced visit is preceded by the arrival of a statue for Wiep. Mien wants Koos to help Hulja relocate on the same day he plans to look at a boat with Jopie. Then she learns Buurman Buys will be visiting that day as well.

title: Betere stand
description: Hans is organizing a medical convention. Mien gets Koos a job greeting the guests with a short survey. John is overjoyed when Wiep suspects she may be pregnant.

title: De clown
description: Mien is apprehensive after Koos accepts a job in Tokyo. When Lydie and Hans need a clown to perform at the hospital at short notice, Mien suggests Koos do it and Jopie volunteers to form a double act.

title: Champagne
description: Koos objects when Mien wants to buy a new sofa. Hans spots Lydie's awkwardly parked car on the street and moves it. Naturally Lydie thinks that either the police towed it away or else somebody stole it.

title: Een lot uit de loterij
description: Mien wins 15.000 guilders in the Mifax lottery and decides to visit her Foster Parents child in the Philipines. Then she realizes she has another Foster Parents child in Ecuador.

title: 'n Helpende hand
description: Because of trouble brewing in the Philipines, Mien & Koos decided to go to Ecuador instead. John's mother is severely ill, meaning he has to leave for Paramaribo. Koos becomes inadvertently becomes an accomplice to a burglary.

title: Een jongensdroom
description: Koos thinks he's found the perfect gift to take along to Ecuador when he and Mien visit their Fosters Parent Child. Lydie is suddenly working overtime again now that John is out of the country.

title: Angel
description: Mien & Koos travel to Ecuador, accompanied by his fishing rods. Annie & Jopie will look after the Dobbelsteen household and take over Mien's household duties for Dr. Lydie.

title: Als de kat van huis is...
description: Annie breaks a window while trying out one of Hans' golf clubs and causes a riot when she spots a mouse in the bedroom. Koos & Mien are very impressed with the way the people of Ecuador live with poverty.

title: Koning Voetbal
description: Koos & Jopie try to fix up a trophy case for Café Carillion & Mien enters the football-pool. Lydie buys a new dress for a TV appearance in "Met Witteman" and Wiep shows off some of her designs to the shopkeeper.

title: Staphylococulo
description: Wiep is going to join John in Suriname for his mother's funeral. A lot of his relatives that aren't going, come round to tell her to take along gifts for the family. Hans is sent home from the hospital with a msra-infection.

title: Speculeren
description: When Koos is fixing up Mrs. Bijlstra's bathroom, he finds an old money box belonging to a previous house owner. They decide to split the contents, if any, but the problem is opening it. Jopie can do it, but demands 5% for himself.

title: Lansberg-connection
description: With Wiep about to return from Paramaribo, Jopie & Koos make Lydie and Mien nervous with stories about drug smuggling. When Koos & Jopie visit a police station to report vandalism in the train, Jopie is reminded of an old fine.

title: Sinterklaasje
description: Dr. Lydie and family receive Sinterklaas gifts but nobody knows who bought them. Two Sinterklazen get into a fight at Café Carillon and Koos & Mien end up playing Sint & Piet.

title: Kek in 't pak
description: Flossie suffers from fleas. Hans needs a new suit. Koos & Jopie start a new business cleaning out people's attics. Mien is there first client and they soon rediscover Mien & Annie's long forgotten musical repertoire.

title: Surprise party
description: Mien & Annie are going to perform at their Aunt's eighties birthday. Wiep takes Mien to Rogier's store to pick up some petticoats and Marilyn Monroe shoes.

title: De pottekijker
description: Lydie has a young male colleague looking over her shoulder at her practice. Mien thinks the doctor is looking for a replacement for Dr. John. Her suspicious worsen when the young man shows an interest in Wiep.

title: Afzien
description: Lydie goes on a diet so she can fit in an old dress at Hans' upcoming party. Mien is also slightly overweight and needs to have a complete physical. Wiep has been commissioned to paint a cauliflower.

title: Annemarie
description: Wiep's rather carefree girlfriend Annemarie comes to stay with her after leaving her husband.

title: Wilde meiden
description: Annemarie buys an expensive outfit at Rogier's to go out on the town and Mien gets one for free to compensate for the alarm Koos & Jopie put in. Lydie gets annoyed at Annemarie's flirty nature with Hans.

title: Een wrak
description: Koos & Jopie go fishing at 5 AM and also plan to look at a boat for sale. Lydie takes her ailing mother home with her to better take care of her.

title: Zeker is zeker
description: Lydie has already had enough of her mother staying with them. John comes back from Suriname earlier than expected and finds Wiep finally ready to marry him. Koos' fixer-upper boat has been stolen.

title: De zoete inval
description: Koos is disappointed when his missing boat is found because that means he won't get the insurance money. Several old acquaintances turn up in preparation of Wiep & John's wedding, which is nerve wrecking for Mien and even worse for Dr. Lydie's crockery.

title: En ze leefden nog lang en gelukkig...
description: Wiep & John's wedding day has arrived. Coincidentally, it falls on Mien's 25th anniversary as Dr. Lydie's housekeeper.
